Structs/CreditCardPaymentMethod.html#/s:.name: description
Structs/CreditCardPaymentMethod.html#/s:.abstract: A readable description of the Credit Card e.g. XXXX - 1234

Structs/CreditCardPaymentMethod.html#/s:.name: isDefault
Structs/CreditCardPaymentMethod.html#/s:.abstract: Is the payment method the default payment method or not

Structs/CreditCardPaymentMethod.html.name: CreditCardPaymentMethod
Structs/CreditCardPaymentMethod.html.abstract: Represents a payment method the user has.

Protocols/MCPaymentMethodsViewController.name: dismissedMCPaymentMethodsViewController(_:)
Protocols/MCPaymentMethodsViewController.abstract: Will be called whenever the view controller shoud be dismissed

Protocols/CheckoutDelegate.html.name: CheckoutDelegate
Protocols/CheckoutDelegate.html.abstract: The parent of the MCCheckoutViewController must adopt this protocol and implement its methods in order to be able to resize the view when needed. The View will not automatically resize since it might be used in a few different ways (e.g constraints might be broken), so it is your responsibility to respond to the delegate and resize the view appropriately.

Protocols/MCPaymentMethodsViewController.name: MCPaymentMethodsViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/MCPaymentMethodsViewController.abstract: The protocol updates on important changes in MCPaymentMethodsViewController

Enums/CreditCardType.html#/s:FO15MyCheck.name: Unknown
Enums/CreditCardType.html#/s:FO15MyCheck.abstract: Invalid type or simply unrecognised by any of our regular expressions

Enums.html#/s:O15MyCheckWalletUI18Locale.name: LocaleChangeResult
Enums.html#/s:O15MyCheckWalletUI18Locale.abstract: Returns the result of the langauge change. The result will return after loading the new texts with accordance to the new locale.

Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.name: regularFont
Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.abstract: The font that will be used on most texts: labels, text fields etc

Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.name: ragularFontSizeDelta
Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.abstract: Will resize the all elements using the ragular font by adding this delta to the point size of the font.

Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.name: headersFont
Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.abstract: The font that will be used on headers

Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.name: headerFontSizeDelta
Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.abstract: Will resize the all elements using the header font by adding this delta to the point size of the font.

Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.name: buttonsFont
Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.abstract: The font that will be used on buttons

Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.name: buttonFontSizeDelta
Classes/Wallet/UI.html#/s:vVC15MyCheckWa.abstract: Will resize the all elements using the button font by adding this delta to the point size of the font.

Classes/Wallet/UI.html.name: UI
Classes/Wallet/UI.html.abstract: Advanced settings that change UI elements look across all screens.

Classes/Wallet.html#/s:vC15MyCheckWallet.name: ui
Classes/Wallet.html#/s:vC15MyCheckWallet.abstract: Advanced settings that change UI elements look across all screens.

Classes/Wallet.html#/s:vC15MyCheckWallet.name: applePayController
Classes/Wallet.html#/s:vC15MyCheckWallet.abstract: will answer and update applepay specific logic. This object is used by other MyCheck SDKs that need to support Apple Pay.

Classes/Wallet.html#/s:ZvC15MyCheckWalle.name: shared
Classes/Wallet.html#/s:ZvC15MyCheckWalle.abstract: This property points to the singlton object. It should be used for calling all the functions in the class.

Classes/Wallet.html#/s:vC15MyCheckWallet.name: locale
Classes/Wallet.html#/s:vC15MyCheckWallet.abstract: Get the currant locale or nil if the SDK was not yet configured

Classes/Wallet.html#/s:FC15MyCheckWallet.name: getPaymentMethods(success:fail:)
Classes/Wallet.html#/s:FC15MyCheckWallet.abstract: Gets a list of all the payment methods the user can use to make payments.

Classes/MCPaymentMethodsViewController.h.name: createPaymentMethodsViewController(_:)
Classes/MCPaymentMethodsViewController.h.abstract: Create an instance of the manage payment methods page.

Classes/MCCheckoutViewController.html#/s.name: selectedMethod
Classes/MCCheckoutViewController.html#/s.abstract: This variable will always have the currant payment method selected by the user. In the case where the user doesn’t have a payment method the variable will be nil.

Classes/MCCheckoutViewController.html#/s.name: checkoutDelegate
Classes/MCCheckoutViewController.html#/s.abstract: The delegate that will be updated with MCCheckoutViewController height changes

Classes/MCCheckoutViewController.html#/s.name: refresh()
Classes/MCCheckoutViewController.html#/s.abstract: Refreshes the view controller. This should be done after a locale change, or any other change that might change the data or UI of the view comntroller. Any changes to the data from within this fragment should not need a call to refresh.

Classes/MCCheckoutViewController.html.name: MCCheckoutViewController
Classes/MCCheckoutViewController.html.abstract: A view controller that provides the ability to add a credit card and or select a payment method. The view controller is meant to be used as part of a parent view controller using a container view.

Classes/MCPaymentMethodsViewController.h.name: MCPaymentMethodsViewController
Classes/MCPaymentMethodsViewController.h.abstract: A view controller that provides the user with the ability to add a payment method, set a default payment method and delete payment methods. The view controller is meant to be displayed modely.

Classes/Wallet.html.name: Wallet
Classes/Wallet.html.abstract: MyCheckWallet is a singleton that will give you access to all of the MyCheck functionality. It has all the calls needed to manage a user’s payment methods.
